name: In a Flash (T.F.A.N.C.S.)
description:
Your sole mission is to kill everyone in your sight
Time slows down when bullets are near
(This game is made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5)

Controls:
Keyboard AD/ Numpad 46 - Move
Keyboard S / Numpad 2 - Duck
Keyboard E / Numpad 9 - Use weapon
Keyboard Q / Numpad 7- Throw and Take weapon
Keyboard Z / Numpad 1 - Open door/ Hide behind cover(shelves or fridges)
